name: SIZIF
description:
Sisyphus had to push a rock on top of a hill, once on top, the rock roll down the hill then sisyphus had to go down the hill and start over again.
Here you are a SIZIF, you dont have to push the sphere as it roll forward by itselft, but you have to guide the sphere in order to avoid obstacles and make it goes as far as possible.
The speed of the sphere raise over time as like as your score.

Will you beat the other SIZIF on the leaderboard and become the ultimate SIZIF ?

How to play ?

To play SIZIF you just need to know the controls, check and change them if you need in the contols menu.

To use bonuses you have to charge them, then you just have to use the assigned control.

To charge bonuses you have 3 ways :
- Use the drop button and land on small object.
- Avoiding object from a verry close distance.
- Jumping on the side of the floor platform.
